attributes.action: aviod taxing every day cars to heavy tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why raise tax to every day cars yet deduce tax on cars that are designed for lesser people, i.e 1.4 are cheaper than 1.6 if i could find a car that was capable of carrying my family with a 1.4- engine  i would buy one and as a main concern we all use the roads the same way yet bigger cars are taxed at a higher rate! do they do more damage or is this just an uncomprimsed green tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
